main event: A civilian observed a fast-moving round white light in the sky for approximately 15 seconds in Tucson, Arizona.
interesting points: Witness reported the object traveling from NW to SE at high speed,No sound was heard during the observation,The light was described as similar in size to a match head,The sighting coincided with two F4C aircraft landing at a nearby base,Preliminary investigations suggest the object may have been an aircraft or a meteorite.
witness description: Civilian, a geologist, considered a reliable observer
